definition: young people decked out in gorgeous clothes (idiom)
male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Guys and Dolls crowded under the dim light with drinking, dancing, having fun.
sentences.chinese: 昏暗燈光下的紅男綠女擠在一起喝酒，跳舞，玩樂。

sentences.english: This is the street coming and going of Guys and Dolls.
sentences.chinese: 這大街上來來往往的紅男綠女。

definition: lit. as round as pearls and as smooth as jade (idiom)/fig. elegant and polished (of singing or writing)
hard to distinguish real from imitation
one's thoughts in a whirl (idiom); confused/disconcerted/upset
to fight for fame, grab profit (idiom); scrambling for fame and wealth/only interested in personal gain
to make trouble out of nothing
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
lit. to dispel the clouds and see the sun (idiom); fig. to restore justice
Curse of the Golden Flower (2007), period drama movie by Zhang Yimou
pinyin: Man3 cheng2 jin4 dai4 huang2 jin1 jia3
